nodes.bodyText: We need to clean up these configs, muted_actions and muted_deciders are also only needed by master node. Can you create an issue for this?
nit: can we rename value by queueSize or size or resourceSize ?
The other format seems much clearer to me. Why did we change it to this? What does this mean?

Specifying the priority order as an array has two issues :

we can't assign search and index operations with the same level of priority
we need maintain a function to parse all elements in array
